name: SoccerAR
description:
‣‣ Play multiplayer soccer in AR! ◂◂

Steps to play:
‣ Connect to the same WiFi network as your friend.
‣ Stand opposite each other.
‣ Place the AR soccer field on a flat surface.
‣ One player hosts and one player joins. Once both players are ready the game begins!
‣ The first player to score 3 goals is declared the winner!

Tips:
‣ A table or floor with good lighting works best.
‣ If you are having trouble connecting over WiFi, create a Personal Hotspot for your friend to connect to instead.
‣ If you have lost tracking or connection try restarting the app.
‣ If you see a black screen try opening Settings and allow SoccerAR to access the camera.

Send feedback to soccerar@joshcaspersz.com
